properties.description: Our Lounge is open for free tea + coffee, with comfy seats + sofa's, wifi + workspace, a coffee shop without the cost! In school holidays we run 'Make Lunch' and provide a three-course lunch for free to local families on a Tuesday and Thursday 11:30-1:30
